Plot: Ten years have passed, and Sidney Prescott, who has put herself back together thanks in part to her writing, is visited by the Ghostface Killer.
Title: Scream 4
Actors: Lucy Hale, Roger Jackson, Shenae Grimes-Beech, Dane Farwell
tomatoConsensus: The franchise is showing its age, but Scream 4 is undeniably an improvement over its predecessor, with just enough meta humor and clever kills.
